questions.title: 玛丽太热心了，很多人喜欢找她寻求帮助。
questions.answer: Mary is so earnest that many people like to ask her for help.

questions.title: 你的行李箱太重了，我搬不动。
questions.answer: Your luggage is so heavy that I can't lift it.

questions.title: 你太美了，许多男性被你吸引。
questions.answer: You are so beautiful that many males are attracted by you.

questions.title: 比尔的高考成绩太高了，全国人民都为之震惊了。
questions.answer: Bill's achievement of the college entrance exam is so high that thepeople of the whole country are shocked by it.

questions.title: 你的字太小了，我看不清楚。
questions.answer: Your words are so small that I can't see them clearly.

title: ——太孤独了，我没有勇气好好生活下去。
——我再也不会离开你了。

answer.en: I am so lonely that I don't have the courage to live a good life.
I don't have the strength to stay away from you anymore.

title: ——这个题目太难了，我算不出答案。
——不要着急，让我来演示计算过程给你看。

answer.en: This problem is so difficult that I can not answer it.
Don't worry. Let me show you the calculative process.

title: ——她的演讲太完美了，所有的听众都给她热烈的掌声。
——她一直都是一个好的演讲者。

answer.en: Her speech was so perfect that all listeners gave him enthusiasticapplause.
She has been a good speaker.
